name: Karkadann
description: The Karkadann is a massive creature with impressive physical abilities, equipped with lethal horns and powerful hooves.
memorable: It can impale and restrain enemies while simultaneously dealing ongoing damage with its horn attacks.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and eliminate threats using its brute strength and tactical abilities.
relations: Related to other powerful monstrosities, often serving as a dominant creature in its territory.
environment: Commonly found in rugged terrains or vast open fields.
strengths: High melee damage output, can restrain opponents, and has Magic Resistance.
weaknesses: Poor saving throws against spells except for Constitution, and lower intelligence and charisma.
attacks: Strikes with deadly horn attacks and can unleash crushing damage with powerful hooves.
most_powerful_ability: Impaling Charge, allowing it to impale and deal continuous damage to a grappled foe.
senses: It has a passive perception of 14, allowing it to notice things in its environment well.
skills: Proficient in perception, but not exceptionally skilled.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and cannot be poisoned.
Healing Touch can restore hit points and cure diseases or poisons.
Can hurl impaled targets, potentially causing additional damage.
test_queries: massive beast with deadly horn attacks
huge creature that can heal allies
monster with high melee damage and healing
